content:
After being given a text, shorten it without affecting its original meaning.
Friedrich Nietzsche (1844-1900) was a German philosopher known for his radical ideas and critiques of common beliefs. He developed the concept of the Übermensch and was a major influence in existentialism and nihilism.
Friedrich Nietzsche (1844-1900) was a German philosopher known for his radical ideas, the concept of the Übermensch, and his influence on existentialism and nihilism.
